timeline.bodyText: should isFirstRequest be volatile? it seems it is updated in two different places that could be run on different threads

replies.bodyText:
should isFirstRequest be volatile? it seems it is updated in two different places that could be run on different threads

It should not be volatile since it is done in 2 different path. One within drain Regular, another if there is fusión.
That said, there is no contention on modifying this field
